channel.title: Solar sail interactive simulation thingy
channel.description:
Solar Sail application thingy Uses newton's second law and euler's method of integration to solve.
CONTROLS left/right - rotate sail up/down - change sail area q - toggle sail orbit lock (doesnt work very well) w - teleport back to start, useful if you fuck up and end up in deep space e - fold/unfold sail r - pause
VECTORS red vector - gravitational acceleration orange vector - light pressure acceleration blue vector - velocity
[URL=http://img201.imageshack.us/img201/3972/shotk.png][IMG]http://img201.imageshack.us/img201/3972/shotk.th.png[/img][/URL]

The bug bootnecklad is refering to is the q - toggle sail orbit lock (doesnt work very well).
Essentially its a bug where i use completely the wrong vector in the cross product calculation.

item.title: Solar sail interactive simulation thingy
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

Solar Sail application thingy
Uses newton’s second law and euler’s method of integration to solve.

CONTROLS
left/right - rotate sail
up/down - change sail area
q - toggle sail orbit lock (doesnt work very well)
w - teleport back to start, useful if you fuck up and end up in deep space
e - fold/unfold sail
r - pause

VECTORS
red vector - gravitational acceleration
orange vector - light pressure acceleration
blue vector - velocity

Read full topic
